User.Name: John Doe
User.Bio: A cocktail enthusiast with a penchant for creating unique mixes.

Drinks.Name: Margarita
Drinks.Instructions: 1. Salt the rim of the glass. 2. Mix the ingredients with ice. 3. Shake well and strain into the glass.

Drinks.Name: Old Fashioned
Drinks.Instructions: 1. Muddle sugar and bitters with one water at the bottom of a glass. 2. Fill the glass with ice cubes and add whiskey. 3. Garnish with an orange slice and a cocktail cherry.
